import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useState } from "react" import styles from './PostGame.module.css' const validateGameName = (form,error,setError) => { if(!form.name) setError({...error, name: 'This field is obligatory'}) } function PostGame(){ const [form, setForm ]= useState({ name: '', description: '', released: '', metacritic: '', image_one:'', platforms:'', stores: '', developer: '', genres: '', tags:'' }) const [error, setError] = useState({ name: '', description: '', released: '', metacritic: '', image_one:'', platforms:'', stores: '', developer: '', genres: '', tags:'' }) function handleChange(event){ const property = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value setForm({...form, [property]: value}) switch(event.target.name){ case 'name': validateGameName({...form, [property]: value}, error, setError)} } return(
) } export default PostGame
